short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT enhanced, support copy raw markdown, load pdf file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To provide additional features to enhance the ChatGPT experience, including converting replies to markdown strings, uploading files, and automatically asking questions based on regular expressions.
